title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 331.9 - Carrier's or employer's consultant not to treat employee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 331.9 - Carrier's or employer's consultant not to treat employee

State Regulations

No psychologist who examines for an insurance carrier or an
employer or is a psychology consultant for the carrier or employer in the case
of an injured employee, shall subsequently participate in the psychological
care of such injured employee. Nothing herein contained shall affect the right
of transfer by written consent of the injured employee, and the superseding
psychologist shall comply with the provisions of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
331.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
